newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sumitomo Chem, Wako Pure agree photoresist link.
newsitem.headline: Sumitomo Chem, Wako Pure agree photoresist link.

text.p: Sumitomo Chemical Co Ltd and Wako Pure Chemicals Industries Ltd said on Tuesday they had agreed on a tie-up to produce a next-generation photoresist for highly integrated semiconductors.

Under the agreement, Wako Pure, a supplier of high purity chemicals for cleaning semiconductors, will license to Sumitomo Chemical its proprietary raw material technology for photoresist, the companies said in a joint statement.
Sumitomo Chemical will combine the licensed technology with its own to produce krypton fluoride photoresist for excimer laser lithography (KrF excimer photoresist), they said.
Photoresist is a key material used in semiconductor manufacturing
Sumitomo Chemical will develop a market for the product using the strong customer network it has established through its existing photoresist business, the firms said.
